history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Fifth and Highland
TTS Okay, leaving from highland avenue at fifth avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER dude
TTS Okay, going to five guys. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER well
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER 12
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 33 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 71B <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Liberty avenue at 6th St.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 12:01pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Okay.

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 5 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> PPG Place, 3 Fourth avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER repeat

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 5 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> PPG Place, 3 Fourth avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER Goodbye.
